attributes.description: The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / 100km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. The Swift’s floating roof design, solid shoulder lines, and rich side body sculpting unite to give you a driving experience that thrills. Its low, short, wide stance has a presence that can’t be ignored, making you stand out wherever you go. Designed to give you all the right feels, the new Suzuki Swift is a bold statement in design and style.
